   contain the root `toctree` directive.

Welcome to Strompris's documentation!
=====================================

Is my wallet bleeding every time I turn on the heater? This module will help
you find out! 

The code retrieves electricity prices using data from https://www.hvakosterstrommen.no
and displays it as a chart.

To create the webpage run:
**python3 app.py**

   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents:

   Fast API <https://devdocs.io/fastapi/>
   strompris.rst
